thread.title: Linda Weber
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by Linda Weber

author: Linda Weber
title: Linda Weber
text: We bought the Green Pass option and it was worth the extra price. The trains were spotless and comfortable. We were able to make Shinkansen bookings very easily and were always able to travel at convenient times. We also were able to use our Rail Passes in Tokyo on the JR lines. I will definitely buy another Japan Rail Pass next time I visit Japan.
